readable.title: 1401961581_76921a75c5
readable.content: A child is in a harness with onlookers . A girl is hooked to bungee cords as the crowd behind her watches . A girl sits in a harness ready to lift up into the air and behind her is a sign that says " active . " Little girls strapped into harnesses ready to jump up in the air . The small girl is sitting in a harness , strapped to a tether , while others watch .
